page.title: 06Social Activities (Cont.)
page.content: There are 4 football teams in the parish, run by local men. This provides football training and matches for boys between the ages of 9 And 15. Bingo is organized on two evenings a week and is surported by over 200 local people. The parish centre bar is open each night and is a meeting place for a great many people. Dances and socials are held on Saturday and Sunday evenings. The centre is also used by a great many parishioners as well as local people for their own private celebrations such as 18th. & 21st. birthday parties, weddings and anniversaries.
